reviews.review_msg: Took this as an asynchronous class so unfortunately I only had x1 class a week with a TA (who was not good at all). If you fall behind, good luck... almost weekly quizzes and tests. Final exams (especially the speaking and listening sections) are impossible to do and imo not even the classwork prepares you for them.

I took this class out of interest towards Mandarin. However, this course ruined everything. Do not take this course unless you are an enthusiastic Chinese that pretends not to know anything in mandarin. Because of such students, you will get demotivated as you will work hard and yet get bad grades. TA is good, but again the environment is not
